name: Ka-Bob
description:
Down to your last skewer, you must figure out how to prepare a meal without contaminating your food. This puzzling game about organization will test your spacial awareness and planning abilities.

This game was created for the GMTK 2019 Jam

Graphics inspired by the CGA palette

Music written with Commodore 64 synths

Created using:

Unity

FMOD

Fruity Loop Studio

Pyxel Edit
